text: Nuko abagizwe abanyantege nke babwire abibone bati “Ahubwo ni umugambi mwacuze ijoro n’amanywa, ubwo mwadutegekaga guhakana Allah no kumubangikanya n’ibigirwamana.” Maze ubwo bazabona ibihano (buri tsinda) rizahisha umubabaro waryo, hanyuma dushyire iminyururu mu majosi y’abahakanye. Ese hari ibindi bazahemberwa bitari ibyo bakoraga
